name: Rapidfire Dungeons
description:
In Rapidfire Dungeons you get a new enemy encounter every 10 seconds. Hope you cleared the last encounter, because the new enemies are coming in ON TOP OF YOU.

WASD to move
LMB to shoot

Rapidfire Dungeons was made by Daniel Steger  and is an experiment in procedural enemy generation. It was made for Bullet Hell Jam.

Music

"Cyborg Ninja" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
